@nzherald Question; over 48 hours later we still have no comment from ardern on the high court ruling. And no media has reported on what this means for her illegal mandates. Please tell me Why..?

@Team_ICWT @xbrit4adventure @nzherald Rights cannot be removed, unlike privileges. I would support anyone wanting to engage in the aforementioned activities. These are the societal costs I was talking about.
